entry.title: 8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig – Assorted
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Dab Rig
Price: 22.49

Handblown from the highest quality borosilicate glass, the 8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig provides top-quality dabs in a compact, elegant, and user-friendly package.

 

  • High-quality Borosilicate Glass
  • Bell Beaker Design w/ Reinforced Base
  • Bent Neck w/ Rimmed Mouthpiece
  • Fixed Showerhead Percolator
  • 5mm Female Joint; Male Banger
  • Beautiful Fumed Glass Pattern
  • Available in a Variety of Assorted Colours

 

This compact-sized dab rig has a straightforward, functional design that is suitable to beginners and veteran smokers alike. The fumed glass patterns give it an elegant and mysterious look to enhance the dabbing experience. Its high-quality construction makes it a breeze to clean and maintain, ensuring that it will last for years with proper care.

If you’re in the market for a beautiful yet reasonably priced dab rig that delivers impactful hits every time, then the 8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig will make a perfect addition to your collection.

entry.title: Famous X Clear Glass Downstem – 115mm – Tray of 20
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Downstem
Price: 59.99

The Famous X Clear Glass Downstem provides clean, clear, ultra-smooth hits and looks great with any bong.

 

  • 115mm
  • Clear Glass
  • Percolation Slits
  • Frosted Ground Joint
  • Signature Famous X Black Star Logo
  • POP Display Tray Included

 

The Famous X Clear Glass Down Stem makes the perfect add-on for any bong!

This awesome essential accessory adds an extra level of water filtration to your smoking experience for hits that are as smooth as can be! The precision-cut percolation slits give you more control over your smoke and will allow for bigger and cleaner hits than ever before!

This handy little accessory is perfect for bong owners who want a smoother smoking experience. Its quality construction makes cleaning and maintenance a breeze, and with proper care, it will last for years. Its straight, minimalist design features clear glass with the Famous X signature Black Star logo and comes conveniently packaged ready-to-go POP display tray of 20.

entry.title: Famous X 90 Degree Glass Ash Catcher
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Ash Catcher
Price: 7.49

The 90 Degree Glass Ash Catcher by Famous X provides clean, clear, ultra-smooth hits and looks great with any bong.

  • High-quality Borosilicate Glass
  • Diffused Downstem
  • Built-in Bowl
  • Functional Minimalist Design
  • Comfortable 90° angled joint
  • Standard 14.5 mm male joint

The Famous X 90 Degree Glass Ash Catcher makes the perfect add-on for any bong!

Not only will this awesome accessory help keep your pipes and percolators clean, but it adds an extra level of water filtration to your smoking experience for hits that are as smooth as can be! This attractive and well-designed glass accessory will give you more control over your smoke and will allow for bigger and cleaner hits than before.

This handy little accessory is perfect for bong owners who want a smoother smoking experience. The Glass Ash Catcher’s quality construction make cleaning and maintenance a breeze, and with proper care, it will last for years. Its straight, minimalist design features clear glass with the Famous Brandz signature star logo, and comes individually packaged in a stylish box.

entry.title: Glass Bowl with Handle – Female Joint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Herb Bowl
Price: 4.99

This functional and effective 14mm herb bowl is constructed from durable glass and features a female joint and a colored glass handle for safe and hassle-free removal. The handle also provides anti-roll stabilization by preventing the bowl from rolling away on flat surfaces.

  • Made from durable glass
  • Glass-on-glass joint
  • Colored glass handle
  • Anti-roll stabilization
  • 14mm female joint
  • Easy to clean and maintain

If you’re looking for an affordable, durable glass bowl as a back up or replacement part for a piece with a male joint, this one should do the trick. It’s designed for everyday use and will last for years with proper care.

entry.title: Dopezilla Glass Replacement Bowl with Handle – Male Joint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dopezilla
Type: Herb Bowl
Price: 4.90

Every now and again, it’s time to replace your bowl. This functional and effective 14mm replacement bowl is perfect your Dopezilla bong! It will match the aesthetic perfectly, is constructed from durable glass, and features a male joint with a clear glass handle. The handle also provides anti-roll stabilization by preventing the bowl from rolling away on flat surfaces.

  • Made from durable glass
  • Glass-on-glass joint
  • Clear glass handle
  • Anti-roll stabilization
  • 14mm male joint
  • Easy to clean and maintain

If you’re looking to replace your Dopezilla bowl, or simply looking for a quality, affordable bowl for any glass piece with a 14mm female joint, this replacement bowl is just the ticket! It’s designed for everyday use and will last for years with proper care.

entry.title: Snoop Dogg Pounds Replacement Bowl w/ Handle – Female Joint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Snoop Dogg Pounds
Type: Herb Bowl
Price: 7.49

Replace your main thruster and blast off into outer space with this Snoop Dogg Pounds Replacement Bowl. Functional and effective, this 14mm replacement bowl is specially designed for use with your Snoop Dogg Pounds bong, specifically for the Starship model. It will match the aesthetic perfectly, is constructed from durable glass, and features a male joint with a clear glass handle. The handle also provides anti-roll stabilization by preventing the bowl from rolling away on flat surfaces.

  • Durable borosilicate glass
  • Glass-on-glass joint
  • Clear glass handle
  • Anti-roll stabilization
  • 14mm female joint
  • Easy to clean and maintain
  • Designed for Snoop Dogg Pounds Starship

If you’re looking to replace the bowl on your Snoop Dogg Pounds Starship, or if you’re simply looking for a quality, affordable bowl for any glass piece with a 14mm male joint, this replacement bowl should send you to the moon and back! It’s designed for everyday use and will last for years with proper care.

entry.title: Dr. Dabber Budder Cutter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr.Dabber
Type: Dabbing Tool
Price: 32.99

The Dr. Dabber Budder Cutter is a heated, multi-use dabbing device, designed for sticky, hard to manage oils or waxes. The heat source is carefully calibrated to avoid overheating while minimizing heating time to ensure a perfect cutting/loading temperature. It also doubles as a heated loading tool for our vaporizer pens. Featuring interchangeable heating tips, the Budder Cutter is an innovative, versatile tool suitable for many different materials and applications - designed for the dab connoisseur.

 

  • Sleek, Portable Design
  • Long Battery Life
  • Calibrated Heating
  • 7 Interchangeable Tips
  • 1 Year Warranty
  • Percolator Attachment Included
  • Sleek, Stylish Design

 

Slice and Dice with the Budder Cutter!

 

*This unit is not a vaporizer.

entry.title: Skilletools Anodized XXL Dabber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skilletools
Type: Dabbing Tool
Price: 34.99

For big jobs, you need a Big Tool. Measuring in at 11” x 3”, Skilletools’ massive Anodized XXL is the biggest dab tool you’ll ever need! It features a double-sided scraper tip and shovel tip, as well as the Skilletools logo against the high-quality anodized metallic finish.

entry.title: 5” Pineapple Glass Dab Tool – Assorted Colours
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Dabbing Tool
Price: 3.49

Looking for a quality glass dab tool with a fruity flair? Try this funky 5” Pineapple Glass Dab Tool on for size.

  • Worked Borosilicate Glass
  • Pineapple Design
  • Pointed Glass Tip
  • Assorted Colours/Colours
  • For Use with Concentrates
  • Works with Any Dab Rig

 

This charismatic pineapple-adorned dabber is made from durable, worked borosilicate glass and features a fine, pointed tip. You can use this dabber to easily move and manipulate your dabs according to how you smoke. The pointed tip is ideal for accessing the nooks and crannies of your dab container.

 

Whether you’re new to dabbing and need a memorable first tool, or you are simply looking to expand your existing glass collection, this sweet pineapple dabber should fit the bill nicely.

entry.title: Skilletools Anodized Mini “Dr. Dab” Dabber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skilletools
Type: Dabbing Tool
Price: 8.99

Concentrate on concentrates with Skilletools signature “Dr. Dab” dabber tool in miniature form with a high-quality anodized finish. Features a long, rounded tip, flat grip, and the Skilletools logo in silver.

Skilletools Mini-Tools include an attached metal keychain for easy access and improved portability.
